relatedanime.anime: Dragon Ball Z: Kami to Kami

recommendations.recommendation: This is what DBGT should have been although it has its flaws. For fans of the DB franchise. Good soundtrack though.
If you`re a fan of Dragon Ball, you`ll like DBS. The first 30 ish episode is about what we see in the 2 movies. After that, it becomes more and more interesting right until the last episode.

anime.description: Reuniting the franchise`s iconic characters, Dragon Ball Super will follow the aftermath of Goku`s fierce battle with Majin Buu, as he attempts to maintain earth`s fragile peace.

tag.name: horny nosebleed
tag.description: In Japanese media, healthy young men who have no other sexual outlet will often suffer nosebleeds upon seeing the naked female body, or even just a pair of well-filled panties. The nosebleed is, of course, a visual shorthand/euphemism for sexual arousal. It is commonly interpreted that way for males and females, with little trickles of blood indicating mild arousal, and gushing fountains of blood indicating erection/extreme arousal in both sexes. It can also be interpreted as shorthand strictly for erections in males. In that case, when blood shoots from the nose explosively, and in ridiculous quantity, the implication would be an ejaculation. Source: TVTrope

tag.name: extrasensory perception
tag.description: Extrasensory perception (ESP), involves reception of information not gained through the recognized physical senses but sensed with the mind. The term was coined by Sir Richard Burton, and adopted by Duke University psychologist J. B. Rhine to denote psychic abilities such as telepathy and clairvoyance, and their trans-temporal operation as precognition or retrocognition. ESP is also sometimes casually referred to as a sixth sense, gut instinct or hunch, which are historical English idioms. The term implies acquisition of information by means external to the basic limiting assumptions of science, such as that organisms can only receive information from the past to the present. In Japanese usage the term is often misappropriated to refer to any supernatural, non-magical, super power. Users of such powers are called `esper` in Japanese. The term `esper` is not normally in use outside of Japan but is slowly being introduced due to its usage in anime and manga. In anime/manga the following powers, among others, are described as ESP: - telepathy - precognition - clairvoyance - retrocognition - remote viewing - aura reading - out-of-body experiences (OBE) - psychokinesis

tag.name: alien
tag.description: This entity or creature was born on another world than the main characters.

tag.name: dynamic
tag.description: Some of the central structural elements in anime are: Plot Continuity How does the plot or several plots unfold. Are they a strictly linear retelling of one big continuing story, a serial, possibly with several side stories, or is the content chopped into a set of unconnected episodes, only sharing the same setting and characters? Stereotype Characters Then there is the question of the character set presentation. Is it completely original, or is it your usual stereotypical character cast. Both choices have their merit, for example it would not really make much sense to reinvent the wheel for a harem anime. Fans of that genre come to expect their favourite stereotype protagonists. Plot Twists Finally there is the question of how complex the plot / the story unfolds. Are there side-plots that merge into the main plot leading to unexpected plot twists, or is the anime quite predictable? The latter would not be appropriate for detective stories. In harem anime on the other hand a foreseeable outcome is actually something the fans will come to expect.

tag.name: setting
tag.description: The setting describes in what time and place an anime takes place. To a certain extent it describes what you can expect from the world in the anime.

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: place
tag.description: The places the anime can take place in. Includes more specific places such as a country on Earth, as well as more general places such as a dystopia or a mirror world.

tag.name: calling your attacks
tag.description: "GIGAAAAAA DRIIIIIILLL BREAKEEEEEERRR" If you can do something more impressive than just throw a punch, your attack(s) must have an equally impressive name. More than that, you have to call it out as you launch the attack. It doesn`t matter if it`s a martial arts move, a magical spell or your secret superweapon, if you can`t say its name, it just isn`t nearly as cool or effective. Having a special attack is always a must, but not impressive enough. Every special attack needs a name. A really awesome and outstanding name which is easy to remember and even easier and impressive to yell. Because it just is not enough to name your attack. No, to unleash the full power of your attack, you have to call its name in your most MANLY and LOUDEST voice. It does not matter whether it is a martial arts move, a magical spell or flying drills from your mecha, if you can`t call its name, it just isn`t nearly as cool or effective. Not a requirement but wearing shades while calling your attack makes it at least twice as cool, moreover giving your mecha or magical companion shades too results in an immeasurable level of awesomeness, bringing down every enemy just through the POWER OF YOUR VOICE. A standard feature of practically every mecha, mahou shoujo, high fantasy, or martial arts anime. [Source: TV Tropes]

tag.name: collateral damage
tag.description: The usually action orientated anime does not only show large amounts of combat and weapon use, but also the incidental massive destruction of property, often due to the inability of the protagonists to aim properly. Example: Mecha duking it out in a densely populated urban area.

tag.name: super power
tag.description: Be it an ancient Greek Heracles, a cybernetic muscle-man, or a fourteen year-old girl in a mini-skirted sailor suit. As long as they have super powers, they`re in the show.

tag.name: space
tag.description: The final frontier.

tag.name: Earth
tag.description: The Earth is the third planet from the Sun, and the densest and fifth-largest of the eight planets in the Solar System. It is in effect a ball of hot mud, but on the surface it`s cold enough, so most of us live on it (or are supposed to). It is circa 4.5 billion years old, and, unless we humans succeed in destroying it over the next couple of centuries, it is expected to last for quite another while, though the changes in the Sun`s emissions due to its aging will likely cause the extinction of everything; the species of earthlings are guaranteed to die, even if we fail to kill them -- unless, of course, we find ourselves another planet and figure out a way to take everything there. Our little planet on a corner of this galaxy may mean nothing in the grand scheme of things, but to its inhabitants it is their home, so, as a species, we cherish it dearly, to the point many cultures even to this day deify it. Being the home to the human civilizations, the Earth is the main setting of most fiction, be it anime or otherwise, but not only are many titles set in other places, such as unrelated fantasy worlds, in a considerable number of fictional titles the Earth is actually destroyed by aggressive alien invaders.

tag.name: hell
tag.description: "Abandon hope all ye who enter here" You been a sinner? Welcome to Hell, where you will suffer for all eternity for your sins. The devils with pitchforks will take good care of you there.

tag.name: time travel
tag.description: In time travel anime characters are transported through time either figuratively or literally to find themselves either in the past or the future

tag.name: slapstick
tag.description: Slapstick humour is generally recognized by lots of physical abuse, horseplay and practical jokes. Also often seen are impossible situations, using sounds to illustrate impossible stunts that aren`t shown on-screen and to create tension for audience anticipation.

tag.name: other planet
tag.description: The anime will fit this category if some or all of the action takes place on another planet which is supposedly in the same universe as Earth, not a complete fantasy world; usually there has to be some concept of space travel. The Latin name for Earth - Terra, would also pass the condition of being in the same universe as Earth. Basically, even mentioning of Earth existing or having existed would be enough. Although Moon is a moon, it also qualifies as Other Planet.

tag.name: humanoid alien
tag.description: Humanoids are aliens, intelligent beings who do not originate from Earth, but have a striking similarity to humans or at least show the basic body layout, i.e. two arms and legs, head with two eyes and ears, one nose and mouth. Though the latter - head-related features - may vary. As "DearS" shows some aliens actually exhibit super-human beauty, or as in the case of "Onegai Teacher" they are genetically compatible to humans for some strange reason.

tag.name: action
tag.description: Action anime usually involve a fairly straightforward story of good guys versus bad guys, where most disputes are resolved by using physical force. It often contains a lot of shooting, explosions and fighting.

tag.name: science fiction
tag.description: Science fiction stories usually focus on how situations could be different in the future when we are more technologically advanced; due to either our own achievements or having met with other civilizations whom we have learned from.

tag.name: comedy
tag.description: Anime whose central struggle causes hilarious results. These stories are built upon funny characters, situations and events. A comedy anime is laced with humour and sets out to provoke laughter from the audience. Japanese humour can be a bit strange to westerners, so if you`re new to this type of humour, just bear with it; it`ll most likely grow on you if you`re a fan of other kinds of comedy.

tag.name: male protagonist
tag.description: This anime has a male protagonist.

tag.name: emotions awaken superpowers
tag.description: During an extreme emotional state — rage, love, hate, angst, sadness, compassion — something inside the character will "click" that will increase greatly his/her power or a new superpower awakes, that surpasses anything achieved by him/her until then.

tag.name: fighting
tag.description: For some reason or other one faction has to take it out on some opponent via fight or battle. Typical examples of this are all the anime with "endless pointless fighting" tag.

tag.name: aliens living on earth
tag.description: There`s an alien or a hive of aliens blending into society near you!

tag.name: competition
tag.description: Some sort of confrontation occurs in this show. The protagonists "duke it out" via various competitions.

tag.name: time machine
tag.description: A machine (or sometimes a living being) that accomplishes time travel. The details (what travels in which direction in time and how far) vary wildly from anime to anime.

tag.name: nearly almighty protagonist
tag.description: Man 1: "Hey man, did you see me take down that guy over there, there`s no way he could have survived that!" Man 2: "Yeah I know what you mean, it would take the strength of 1 million men to be able to ..... HE`S GETTING BACK UP!!?!?" *synonymous jaws dropping* This anime`s main character is comparable to the gods themselves in terms of resistibility, strength and/or downright bad-assery. Whenever they seem as if the fire inside has burnt out, they rise from the ashes with enough tenacity and ferocity to vanquish any foe that dare stand against them.

tag.name: predominantly male cast
tag.description: The anime features a mostly male cast, i.e. female characters are rare. Example: Reverse harem setting with a plethora of bishounen.

tag.name: visible aura
tag.description: Characters are surrounded by a visible energy field usually representing inner strength, but not restricted to only that.

tag.name: perpetual ongoing
tag.description: No end in sight! No matter what the genre may be or what the storyline consists of, this series just keeps on going... and on... and on. The obvious downside to this is the lack of story-related focus, usually some vague goal is simply never reached. This lack of conclusion can tend to annoy, making the whole series pretty much pointless. Examples: One Piece, Naruto, Bleach, Detective Conan, Dragon Ball (Z), or Pocket Monsters (Pokemon).

tag.name: predominantly adult cast
tag.description: This show features mostly adults. That means children and teenagers are relatively rare and unlikely to hold significance to the plot. That is a rare trait in anime, as most shows spin around children or teenagers.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: tropes
tag.description: A trope is a commonly recurring literary and rhetorical devices, motifs or clichés in creative works. This use is a broader redefining of a literary trope, the use of figurative language, via word, phrase, or even an image, for artistic effect, such as using a figure of speech. Source: Wikipedia

tag.name: spirit realm
tag.description: A spirit realm is a place where inhabited by the spirits of the dead, deities, demons, and other such entities. Examples would be Heaven and Hell in Christianity, the Elysium in Greek mythology, and so on.

tag.name: speculative fiction
tag.description: Speculative fiction is an umbrella genre encompassing fiction with certain elements that do not exist in the real world, often in the context of supernatural, futuristic or other imaginative themes. This includes, but is not limited to, science fiction, fantasy, superhero fiction, horror, utopian and dystopian fiction, fairytale fantasy, supernatural fiction, as well as combinations thereof. Source: Wikipedia

tag.name: Crunchyroll Anime Awards
tag.description: Crunchyroll Anime Awards are annual awards given to recognize anime from the previous year. The awards were first held in January 2017. The judges create a short list in different categories and public votes for the winners are held online.

character.name: Kame Sennin
character.description: Kame Sennin is an ancient and wise martial arts master and the first Earthling to wield the Kamehameha. Though he seems frail, he is a mighty warrior, having trained Grandpa Gohan, Gyuumaou, Son Gokuu, and others.

character.name: Son Gokuu
character.description: Son Gokuu is a Saiyajin warrior who was sent to Earth when he was a child.

character.name: Vegeta
character.description: Vegeta is the prince of the Saiyajin race and http://anidb.net/ch2103 [Gokuu]`s most fearsome rival. He is a very prideful person and, as a full-blooded saiyajin, loves the prospect of a good battle.

character.name: Kame
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch2085 [Kame Sennin]`s turtle. He`s celebrating his 1000th birthday in http://anidb.net/e16565 [episode 117] of http://anidb.net/a1530 [Dragon Ball Z]

character.name: Oolong
character.description: Oolong is a shapeshifting, anthropomorphic pig that uses his abilities for his own greedy desires. He was expelled from shapeshifting training for stealing the teacher`s underwear, so he lacks the ability to change his form for more than five minutes at a time without a break. He joins with Goku to search for the Dragon Balls and eventually steal them, but he abandons his plans. In Dragon Ball Z, he is often in the company of Roshi.

character.name: Puar
character.description: Puar is a soft-spoken shapeshifting blue creature and the constant companion of Yamcha. He uses his abilities to shapeshift into anything to help Yamcha rob passersby in the desert. Afterwards, he travels with Yamcha and Goku during Dragon Ball, and continues to live with Yamcha afterwards.

character.name: Shenlong
character.description: Shenron is the dragon that appears when someone collects all seven of Earth`s Dragon Balls and calls him forth. He will grant one wish and then vanish, scattering the 7 Dragon Balls throughout the Earth once again.

character.name: Uranai Baba
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch2085 [Kame Sennin]`s older sister.

character.name: Freezer
character.description: Freezer was the main antagonist in the Freezer Saga of http://anidb.net/a1530 [Dragon Ball Z]. He`s an alien tyrant with plans of universal domination. He`s cunning, charismatic, arrogant, imperative and, of course, powerful. He possesses different abilities such as ki manipulation and transformation. He also has high survivability, as he could live on even when wounded and thrown away into outer space.

character.name: Son Gohan
character.description: Gohan is introduced as the first son of the primary protagonist, Son Goku, and his wife, Chi Chi, in volume #17 of the original manga, or the premiere episode of its animated adaptation, Dragon Ball Z. Gohan is the first Saiyan/Human hybrid in the series. As opposed to full-blooded Saiyans, whose hair stays the same from birth, Gohan`s is drawn at varying lengths, and changes markedly in style. Many of Yamcha`s hairstyles are used by Gohan at various points in his life. Initially, Gohan is illustrated garbed in a Hanfu-like surcoat with the Chinese character 孫, fixed on the front and the four-star Dragon Ball fitted on top of his hat. Piccolo later supplies him with a keikogi fashioned after Goku`s, but substitutes it with the demon character "魔" as a sign of his admission into the Demon Tribe. Normally thereafter, Gohan is drawn with a keikogi modeled after Piccolo`s own, with the anime recoloring his wristbands from blue to red and, during the Cell Games tournament, his obi from red to blue, despite reverting to the original colors for the former. On Namek, Gohan is portrayed in battle armor worn by Frieza`s henchmen, having been given it by Vegeta in preparation for their encounter with Frieza. Prior to his second fight with Majin Buu, Gohan asks Kibito for an outfit resembling his father`s, and is then drawn in a keikogi identical to Goku`s.

character.name: Bubbles
character.description: Bubbles is the monkey pet of Kaiou. He serves a special purpose during Kaiou`s training lessons, particularly one of two endurance tests, where trainees are instructed to chase after Bubbles in an effort to catch him. His name is a reference to Michael Jackson`s pet monkey, who is also named Bubbles.

character.name: Gregory
character.description: Gregory is a little flying cricket and http://anidb.net/ch11407 [Kaiou]`s pet. He only appears in the anime and in a few movies.

character.name: Kaiou
character.description: Kaiou is the kaiou of the northern quadrant of the galaxy. His companion is a pet monkey named http://anidb.net/ch11405 [Bubbles] and in anime adaptation, http://anidb.net/a1530 [Dragon Ball Z], he also has a flying cricket companion named http://anidb.net/ch11406 [Gregory]. If a fighter that was allowed to keep his body manages to reach his small planet at the end of Hebi no Michi (Snake Way in the English adaptations), Kaiou trains them. Before training any students though, he forces them to appeal to his strange sense of humor, catch Bubbles, and hit Gregory with a mallet.

character.name: Chaozu
character.description: Chaozu is a small human that resembles a doll with white skin, red cheeks, and one hair under his hat. Though he is not physically strong, he is skilled with psychokinesis and telepathy

character.name: Enma Daiou
character.description: Enma Daiou is the boss of all ogres, who judge the dead. He is based on the Hindu deity Yama. A line of souls leads to his office where he decides whether a soul goes to Heaven or Hell. Compared to the other oni, he is of a different colour, he wears a beard, he has two horns and a helmet (it is unclear whether the horns are his own or belong to the helm), and he is colossal in size.

character.name: Karin
character.description: Karin is a Senbyou (immortal cat) and is at least 800 years old when introduced in Dragon Ball. He is a deity who lives at the top of Karin Tower. The tower is located right underneath Kami`s palace.

character.name: Piccolo
character.description: Piccolo, whose full name is Piccolo Jr., was first introduced as the reincarnation of the evil http://anidb.net/ch22168 [Piccolo Daimaou] in http://anidb.net/a231 [Dragon Ball], making him a demon and arch-rival of the primary protagonist, http://anidb.net/ch2103 [Son Gokuu]. However, it is later revealed that he is from the race of alien beings called Namekians and he decides to team up with http://anidb.net/ch2103 [Gokuu] and his friends in order to beat newer, more dangerous threats.

character.name: Mr. Popo
character.description: He is an immortal genie who tends the grounds of Kami`s Lookout and is bound there eternally as the gardener and caretaker. He uses a magic carpet for Instant Transportation. Though he may not appear to physically age, Mr. Popo is very old; having served Kami, the Guardian of Earth for hundreds of years, he also served Kami`s predecessor, as well as every other guardian of the Earth in the past. Being the loyal and faithful servant that he is, his purpose consists mainly of tending to Kami`s Palace, keeping the Lookout clean, helping to reconstruct Shenron if needed, and most importantly, taking care of Kami. He also tends to the ancient butterfly garden that he planted thousands of years ago, and enjoys the more simple things in life.

character.name: Tenshinhan
character.description: Initially an enemy of Goku who was trained by Kame Sennin`s rival Tsuru Sennin, Tenshinhan soon makes peace with Goku and becomes a Z Fighter along with his friend Chaozu.

character.name: Yajirobe
character.description: Yajirobe is an overweight samurai that Goku meets in Dragon Ball. He is often considered to be rude, unmannered, timid, lazy, and cowardly. He helps Goku prepare for the battle against Piccolo Daimao, and continues to support Goku and his companions, though often from the sideline

character.name: Briefs Hakase
character.description: Dr. Brief is an elderly, brilliant and eccentric scientist. He is Bulma`s father and founder of Capsule Corporation.

character.name: Bulma no Haha
character.description: Bulma`s Mother`s primary role in the series is to take on a housewife-esque role at Capsule Corporation, not working and simply being the wife of a rich scientist. Her name is unknown.

character.name: Mr. Satan
character.description: Mr. Satan (known as Hercule in the English adaptations) is a flamboyant martial artist. After http://anidb.net/ch2103 [Gokuu] and his companions stop attending the Tenkaichi Budoukai, Mr. Satan starts winning them and becomes the reigning champion for many years. On a Q&A with mangaka http://anidb.net/cr1902 [Toriyama Akira] published in Super Exciting Guide - Character Volume on April 3, 2009, it is revealed that Mr. Satan is just a stage/ring name and that his actual first name is "Mark". While it seems like a common name, it is actually written out in katakana as マーク (maaku). If you rearrange the syllables, as you would with many names in the series to derive their puns, you end up with akuma (meaning "devil" or "demon"), which is in concordance with his daughter`s name being a pun on the English word "devil". During the Cell Games, he attempts to fight http://anidb.net/ch24822 [Cell], but even after being swatted away, he is given credit for Cell`s death by the media. He is soon called a world hero, gaining great wealth and a city named after him. Though Gokuu and his companions find his inflated ego and arrogance very annoying, he becomes close to them after befriending the good http://anidb.net/ch41758 [Majin Buu] and by helping defeat Kid Buu by using his appeal to the people of Earth to get energy for the Genki Dama. His daughter, http://anidb.net/ch12209 [Videl], marries http://anidb.net/ch9915 [Gohan].

character.name: Ginyu
character.description: Ginyu is leader of the Ginyu Tokusentai (Ginyu Special Force) and posses the "Body Change" abillity to transfer his mind into another body.

character.name: Trunks
character.description: Son of Vegeta and Bulma; came from the future.

character.name: Jinzouningen 18 Gou
character.description: Jinzouningen 18 Gou (Android #18 in the English adaptations) is a fictional character who first appears in the Dragon Ball manga created by http://anidb.net/cr1902 [Toriyama Akira], followed by the shows http://anidb.net/a1530 [Dragon Ball Z] and http://anidb.net/a233 [Dragon Ball GT]. She is a mass murderer in http://anidb.net/ch13302 [Future Trunks]` timeline. Originally a human, she and her brother were modified into cyborgs by http://anidb.net/ch18381 [Dr. Gero]. On a Q&A with mangaka http://anidb.net/cr1902 [Toriyama Akira] published May 2nd, 2014 it was revealed that her human name was Lazuli. After http://anidb.net/ch20915 [Cell] is defeated, http://anidb.net/ch11414 [Kuririn] uses the Dragon Balls to wish for her and her brother to be turned into humans; http://anidb.net/ch7015 [Shenron] is unable to perform this task because of the unfathomable differences in power between him and the duo, so he wishes instead for their self destruct devices to be removed. Kuririn pursues her and, at some point, they marry and have a daughter named http://anidb.net/ch30874 [Marron]. To clear up the heavily espoused misconception that she is a pure android and therefore could not have a child, Kuririn went on to explain to http://anidb.net/ch2103 [Son Gokuu] during the Tenkaichi Budoukai Saga that she was originally human but that Dr. Gero just "remodeled her a little bit."

character.name: Jinzouningen 17 Gou
character.description: Jinzouningen 17 Gou (Android #17 in the English adaptations) is a fictional character who first appears in the Dragon Ball manga created by http://anidb.net/cr1902 [Toriyama Akira], followed by the shows http://anidb.net/a1530 [Dragon Ball Z] and http://anidb.net/a233 [Dragon Ball GT]. He is a mass murderer in http://anidb.net/ch13302 [Future Trunks]` timeline. Originally a human, he and his sister were modified into cyborgs by http://anidb.net/ch18381 [Dr. Gero]. On a Q&A with mangaka http://anidb.net/cr1902 [Toriyama Akira] published May 2nd, 2014 it was revealed that his human name was Lapis. During the events of the Jinzouningen & Cell arc, he and his sister drive around in a van with http://anidb.net/ch19618 [Jinzouningen 16 Gou], looking for http://anidb.net/ch2103 [Gokuu]. When they finally get to the Kame House, http://anidb.net/ch11416 [Piccolo] tells them Gokuu is not there and refuses to tell them where he went. Piccolo then challenges him to a battle and as they fight, Piccolo`s ki leads http://anidb.net/ch20915 [Cell] (who needs to absorb both jinzouningen to reach its perfect form) to the battlefield. Cell tells Jinzouningen 17 Gou to surrender so he can become a part of "greatness". He refuses and is then defeated during the ensuing battle. After Cell is defeated, http://anidb.net/ch11414 [Kuririn] uses the Dragon Balls to wish for him and his sister to be turned into humans; http://anidb.net/ch7015 [Shenron] is unable to perform this task because of the unfathomable differences in power between him and the duo, so he wishes instead for their self destruct devices to be removed.

character.name: Jinzouningen 8 Gou
character.description: One of http://anidb.net/ch18381 [Dr. Gero]`s early creations. He refuses to fight http://anidb.net/ch2116 [Gokuu] when told to, and instead helps him. The two quickly become friends.

character.name: Son Goten
character.description: Goten is first introduced at age 7, basically appearing out of nowhere. He is the second son of Goku and ChiChi, and it is said he was born shortly before Goku died. There is no explanation as to why he was never shown or mentioned earlier.

character.name: Trunks
character.description: Trunks` Super Saiyajin version.

character.name: Great Saiyaman
character.description: The Great Saiyaman is Son Gohan`s superhero disguise to hide his identity from his classmates.

character.name: Whis
character.description: Whis is the caretaker as well as trainer of http://anidb.net/ch53774 [Beerus], the god of destruction of Universe 7. He and his siblings are one of the strongest beings in all of creation, only admitting that his father http://anidb.net/ch84322 [Daishinkan] and http://anidb.net/ch82121 [King of All] are stronger.

character.name: Yogen-gyo
character.description: Yogen-gyo is a blue fish which has prophetic powers, which http://anidb.net/ch53774 [Beerus] keeps as a pet. Source: Dragon Ball Wikia

character.name: Beerus
character.description: Beerus is the God of Destruction, an individual that`s been around for centuries having destroyed several planets, solar systems and races. Even the mighty saiyajin king Vegeta once bowed in terror infront of him. Beerus even sees Freezer as little more than a nuisance that was too far away to deal with. Beerus spends most of his time either sleeping for decades at a time or traveling around the universe destroying planets, eating whatever people offer him or in general doing whatever he feels like doing. Beerus might have a short temperament and with his title God of Destruction may sound quite evil but despite all this, he is not a bad guy in general but rather more of in the gray area, always honoring his words and not doing things unnecessarily. He is currently the second strongest individual in the Dragonball world. http://anidb.net/ch9004 [Super Saiyajin 3 Gokuu] was nothing but a toy for him. Even after http://anidb.net/ch2103 [Gokuu] ascended to Super Saiyajin God and came back with an increased power, he still did not manage to push Beerus to fight at more than 60% of his full power. Note: As is the case with most of the main cast from Dragonball, Beerus`s name is a pun. In this case, it`s two puns meshed into one. The original pun was on the word `virus` as scriptwriter, Watanabe Yuusuke, stated in an interview with DVD & Blu-ray Magazine that he had written a scenario in which the God of Destruction was actually the one responsible for originally infecting the Saiyajins with evil. However, when Toriyama Akira stepped in and changed a great deal of the movie`s backstory, he thought Beerus`s name was a pun on the English word `beer` and then followed suit by naming http://anidb.net/ch53770 [Whis] (ウイス or uisu) after `whiskey`, another alcoholic beverage.

character.name: Kibito Kaioushin
character.description: Kibito Kaioushin is a result of Potara Fusion between http://anidb.net/ch67299 [Kaioushin] and his servant http://anidb.net/ch67300 [Kibito]. His personality is for the most part similar to the Kaioushin`s, except the unusual amount of concern he had for the damage the fight with http://anidb.net/ch41758 [Buu] was doing to his planet. Source: Dragon Ball Wikia

character.name: Vegetto
character.description: Vegetto is the immensely powerful result of the fusion between Goku and Vegeta by the use of the Potara Earrings.

character.name: Norimaki Arale
character.description: Norimaki Arale is an android built by Norimaki Senbei, known for her naivety, energetic personality, superhuman strength, and lack of common sense. She is also nearsighted and needs to wear glasses. Senbei`s mission is to convince the other citizens of Penguin Village that Arale is no more than a typical 13-year-old girl, which they appear to believe in, despite taking notice to Arale`s numerous displays of superhuman athletic capability. Source: Dragon Ball Wikia

character.name: Shin
character.description: Shin is the kaioushin of Universe 7; because of that, his life is linked to that of http://anidb.net/ch53774 [Beerus]. In Dragon Ball Z, he was one of five kaioushin of the universe, known as Higashi no Kaioushin and subordinate to http://anidb.net/ch107117 [Dai Kaioushin]. However, when http://anidb.net/ch104276 [Maijin Buu] appeared, three of his peers were killed and Buu absorbed Dai Kaioushin, making the surviving Shin the de facto Dai Kaioushin. In Dragon Ball Super, the concept of five kaioushin is ignored and the terms Dai Kaioushin and Higashi no Kaioushin are never used. Instead, the show introduces figures similar to Shin from each universe and refers to them each of them simply as kaioushin.

character.name: Kibito
character.description: Kibito is the assistant of http://anidb.net/ch67299 [Shin].

character.name: Monaka
character.description: Monaka is a delivery man from Universe 7. Beerus recruits him in a tournament with Universe 6, and fabricates a claim that Monaka is stronger than Goku, in order to inspire Goku to become even stronger.

character.name: Kyabe
character.description: Kyabe is a saiyajin from Universe 6. His inner super saiyajin awakes during a martial arts match with Vegeta. He plays an active role as the ace of the Sadala Defense Corps.

character.name: Botamo
character.description: Botamo is one of the strongest warriors from Universe 6. He has a rather confident attitude as he is extremely prideful in his abilities. Source: dragonball wikia

character.name: Frost
character.description: Frost is a member of the Frieza Race. He is a dirty fighter, who is extremely cunning and deceptive. Source: dragonball wikia

character.name: Hit
character.description: Hit is a legendary hitman from Universe 6. During the martial arts tournament against Universe 7, Goku struggled against Hit`s time-stopping technique, "Time Tobashi".

character.name: Mai
character.description: Mai from future.

character.name: Bulma
character.description: Bulma from future.

character.name: Gowasu
character.description: Gowasu is the kaioushin of Universe 10. The betrayal of his trusted disciple http://anidb.net/ch83818 [Zamasu] made him prudent.

character.name: Rou
character.description: Rou is the kaioushin of Universe 9.

character.name: Kai
character.description: Kai is the kaioushin of Universe 11. He is a kind spirit and an optimist.

character.name: Anato
character.description: Anato is the kaioushin of Universe 1. He has a gentle smile.

character.name: Ea
character.description: Ea is the kaioushin of Universe 3. He believes that the robots of his universe could win the Tournament of Power.

character.name: Kuru
character.description: Kuru is the kaioushin of Universe 4. He is a pompous and and self-conscious god who uses archaic speech.

character.name: Oguma
character.description: Oguma is the kaioushin of Universe 5. He has a gentle personality and emphasizes the balance between intelligence and power. Source: Toei

character.name: Vermoud
character.description: Belmod is the god of destruction of Universe 11. He asks Jiren to defeat Son Goku during the Tournament of Power.

character.name: Agu
character.description: Agu is the kaioushin of Universe 12.

character.name: Caulifla
character.description: Caulifla is a Saiyan from Universe 6 and a member of Team Universe 6 who participates in Zeno`s Tournament of Power. She is the the leader of a group of Saiyan criminals. Source: dragonball wikia

character.name: Kahseral
character.description: Kahseral is a cyborg warrior from Universe 11; he is also the general of Pride Troopers.

character.name: Kale
character.description: Kale is a Saiyan from Universe 6 and a member of Team Universe 6. Kale is Caulifla`s best friend, sister-figure, and protégé. She is the latest Legendary Saiyan of Universe 6, a demon warrior who appears once every 1,000 years. Source: dragonball wikia

character.name: Ganos
character.description: Ganos is a fighter from Universe 4. His special ability makes him stronger each battle.

character.name: Napapa
character.description: Napapa is a fighter from Universe 10. He is a skilled practitioner of a martial art that resembles sumo wrestling.

character.name: Narirama
character.description: Narirama is a cyborg warrior from Universe 3. Narirama was modified for the Tournament of Power.

character.name: Peru
character.description: Peru is kaioshin of Universe 2. He is very fond of the battle maidens of his universe.

character.name: Suu Roas
character.description: Suu Roas is a female fighter from Universe 2 and a part of Ribrianne`s entourage.

character.name: Rozie
character.description: Rozie is a female fighter from Universe 2 and a part of Ribrianne`s entourage.

character.name: Obuni
character.description: Obuni is a fighter from Universe 10.

character.name: Pran
character.description: Pran is a fighter from Universe 2. He has the ability to deflect energy bullets.

character.name: Dr. Rota
character.description: Dr. Rota is a boar-like alien and a doctor from Universe 6. During the Tournament of Power, Vegeta throws him off the ring before he can demonstrate his fighting ability.

character.name: Fuwa
character.description: Fuwa is the kaioushin of Universe 6. He was impressed by Son Gokuu`s fighting ability during the tournament between his universe and that of Universe 7. Source: Toei

character.name: Iwan
character.description: Iwan is the god of destruction of Universe 1. Contrary to his gentle appearance, his emotions are intense. Source: Toei

character.name: Pilina
character.description: Pilina is a Namek from Universe 6. He fights in an exquisite combination with Saonel.

character.name: Catopesra
character.description: Catopesra is a policeman from Universe 3. His belt allows him to alter between different modes.

character.name: Jiin
character.description: Jiin is the god of destruction of Universe 12.

character.name: Freezer Gun
character.description: Freezer Gun is the organisation controlled a majority of Universe 7 at the peak of its power and serves as the primary antagonistic force of the first half of the Dragon Ball Z series. Freezer`s father, Cold Daio was the leader of the organisation prior to passing control over to his son. The organisation employs and enslaves powerful races, such as the Saiyans, to take over suitable planets so that they can be sold to the highest bidders, or alternatively to destroy planets which are determined to be not financially viable. Freezer`s forces are equipped with scouters, portable computers mainly used to measure power levels, and wear standard-issue battle armor which usually have dual shoulder guards, matching gloves and Buuts, and some form of skirt armor or crotch guard. Freezer himself does not really consider his soldiers as an army, looking at them more as a convenient group of followers. In reality, the soldiers follow him and his relatives out of fear, though some soldiers are known to be fiercely loyal to Freezer such as the Ginyu Force. Source: Wikipedia When Freezer took over the business from his father in 732, most of the soldiers came from Planet Vegeta. However, Freezer became fearful of the power of the saiyajin and worked to make the army less saiyajin reliant. In five years from his accession, he destroyed Planet Vegeta, and cutting the size of the army in half. In 762, the army took heavy losses while fighting on Planet Namek for the Dragon Balls, but was ultimately defeated. In 764, the army attempt to invade Planet Earth, which proved even more fatal, as Freezer and Cold Daio were slain. Hence the army has reduced to a rump under http://anidb.net/ch72561 [Sorbet]. In 779, the army had become a shadow of its former self, as many words had liberated themselves. Thus Sorbet made a desperate attempt to fix the empire by resurrecting Freezer with the help of the Dragon Balls. However, Freezer was disinterested in fixing his empire and instead set on wasting the remaining resources of the army in order to pursue vengeance; a decision which ended in his, Sorbet`s and the bulk of the army`s soldiers` deaths. In 780, when Freezer was resurrected for the second time, with the guidance of http://anidb.net/ch105587 [Beriblu] and http://anidb.net/ch105586 [Kikono], he decided to rebuild the army.

character.name: Auta Magetta
character.description: Auta Magetta comes from a robot-like race called "Metalman" from Universe 6. Despite being sturdy build, he is sensitive to insults.

character.name: Awamo
character.description: Awamo is a warm and sublime spirit, that is said to see everything.

character.name: Za Pricho
character.description: Za Pricho is a cyborg warrior from Universe 6. He was blown off the ground by new "Qi Gong gun"-technique of Tenshinhan and dropped out.

character.name: Iru
character.description: Iru is kaioushin of the Universe 8. He is a passionate planner.

character.name: Oregano
character.description: Oregano is a fighter from Universe 9.

character.name: Comfrey
character.description: Comfrey is a fighter from Universe 9.

episode.title: 目指せドラゴンボール! ピラフ一味の大作戦!
Aim for the Dragon Balls! Pilaf Gang in Action!
Mezase Dragon Ball! Pilaf Ichimi no Daisakusen!
episode.summary: With all guests now gathered, except for Son Gokuu and Vegeta, Bulma`s birthday party gets underway. Trunks shows Son Goten where his mother hid the bingo tournament grand prize – the Dragon Balls. Not far off from the ship, Pilaf Gang, now poor and hungry, are trying to get by until they find the Dragon Balls and make their wishes come true. When his Dragon Radar picks up a signal coming from Bulma`s ship, Pilaf and his henchmen hastily board the ship, with Trunks and Goten`s help. Meanwhile, on his planet, Kaiou-sama explains to Gokuu who and what Beerus exactly is and that for every benevolent God there must be a malevolent one in order to keep the Universe in balance. Just as he finishes, Beerus and Whis arrive. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: 夢の続きはどこだ!? 超[スーパー]サイヤ人ゴッドを探せ!
Where`s the Rest of the Dream?! In Search of the Super Saiyan God!
¿Cómo continúa el Sueño? ¡En Busca del Super Saiyan Dios!
Yume no Tsuzuki wa Doko Da!? Super Saiyajin God o Sagase!
¿En dónde está la otra mitad del sueño? ¡Buscando al Súper Saiyajin Fase Dios!
episode.summary: Fearing what might happen knowing that the God of Destruction is awake, the Kaioushin urge Kaiou-sama to ensure that Son Gokuu never finds out about Beerus. However, Gokuu overhears the conversation and becomes curious. Back in his temple, Beerus and Whis continue their search for the Super Saiyan God. They soon learn of Son Gokuu and his feats and decide to pay him and Kaiou-sama a visit. Meanwhile, back on Earth, Gokuu`s friends and family members begin gathering on the cruise ship for Bulma`s birthday party except for Vegeta who is still training to overpower Gokuu and everyone else in the Universe. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: 約束のリゾートへ! べジータが家族旅行!?
To the Promised Resort! Vegeta Goes on a Family Trip?!
El Paraíso Prometido ¿¡Vegeta en unas Vacaciones en Familia!?
Yakusoku no Resort e! Vegeta ga Kazoku Ryokou!?
¡Vacaciones en un resort! ¿Vegeta irá a un viaje familiar?
episode.summary: Son Gokuu goes to Planet Kaiou to train with Kaiou-sama. Meanwhile, Vegeta, Bulma, and Trunks take a family trip to a resort. Bulma and Trunks are enjoying the family time together while Vegeta is bothered by the fact that Gokuu gets to train. Fed up with what he considers a waste of time, Vegeta flies away and heads back to the Capsule Corporation to train. Somewhere in space, Beerus and Whis scour an alien planet in search of dinosaur meat. They are confronted by the planet`s strongest dweller, but he proves to be no match for them. Shortly afterwards, Beerus destroys the planet in order to have another vision of his destined opponent – the Super Saiyan God. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: 平和の報酬1億ゼニーは誰の手に!?
The Peace Reward: Who Will Get the 100 Million Zeni!?
¡El Gran Premio de la Paz! ¿Quién se llevará los 100 millones de Zenís?
Heiwa no Houshuu 1-oku Zeni wa Dare no Te ni!?
¡El Premio Mundial de la Paz! ¿Quién se quedará con los 100 millones de Zenis?
episode.summary: After Son Gokuu defeated the dangerous Majin Buu, peace has returned to Earth once again. Chichi wants Gokuu to get a job, so he works as a farmer. Son Goten and his friend Trunks search for a gift for Videl, soon to be his sister-in-law when his older brother, Son Gohan, is engaged to her. First, they decide on rings, then they decide on make-up, but unable to afford any, head for the hot springs in the woods to bottle some mineral water instead. While there, they are attacked by a giant snake, which they manage to scare away. For his purported role in saving Earth from Majin Buu, Mr. Satan has been awarded with 100 million Zeni that he does not want. He decides to give the money to one of the fighters; namely Gokuu. Gokuu gives the money to Chichi, so she would let him train. Meanwhile, somewhere in the depths of space, Beerus, the God of Destruction, has awakened from his slumber. Keen on battling the worthy opponent that appeared to him in his visions, Beerus and his attendant Whis set out to discover who this opponent is. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: Trailer 1
Trailer 2
Ending 1
Opening 1a
悟空見参! ビルス様からのラストチャンス!?
Goku Arrives! A Last Chance from Beerus Sama?!
Gokuu Kenzan! Beerus-sama kara no Last Chance!?
episode.summary: Having powered up, Vegeta charges towards Beerus. He manages to land a few punches before Beerus, who was using only a fraction of his power, knocks him out. Just as he is about to destroy Earth, Beerus has a sudden idea. He decides to give the Earthlings another chance at saving Earth. Meanwhile, fearing for their lives, Pilaf Gang disembark Bulma`s ship on a rowboat and sail away. Thinking he is the same as Majin Buu because of his pink hue, Beerus picks Oolong out of the crowd and challenges him to a game of janken (じゃんけん) to decide the fate of Earth. Oolong manages to draw twice, but Beerus eventually wins and proceeds to power up his attack. Just as Beerus is about to fire, Gokuu chimes in saying he has thought of a way to find out about the Super Saiyan God – by summoning and asking Shenron. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: よくもオレのブルマを! ベジータ怒りの突然変異!?
How Dare You Hurt My Bulma! Vegeta`s Sudden, Angry Shift?!
Yokumo Ore no Bulma o! Vegeta Ikari no Totsuzen Hen`i!?
episode.summary: Beerus effortlessly disposes of Majin Buu, while Vegeta stands by in awe. Vegeta tries to persuade Beerus to calm down and enjoy himself, but he refuses to listen. Trunks and Goten fuse into Gotenks and attack to no avail. Powerless to do anything else, Gotenks starts insulting Beerus for which he is promptly punished. Piccolo, Tenshinhan, and Android 18 try taking on Beerus with little success. Majin Buu attacks again but is unable to land a single hit. While observing the battle, Dende realizes what Beerus actually is and immediately informs Piccolo. Before Piccolo is able to warn him, Gohan powers up and charges towards Beerus. Using Majin Buu as a weapon, Beerus repels Gohan, taking them both out. Being the last one standing, Vegeta confronts Beerus, but he is swiftly brought to the ground. Beerus tells Vegeta that he is disappointed with him; that he is just as weak as his father was. Just as Beerus is about to finish Vegeta, Bulma walks up and slaps him for ruining her party. Beerus retaliates in similar fashion. Seeing Bulma struck infuriates Vegeta; he explodes and powers up immensely. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: 破壊神を怒らせるな! ドキドキ誕生パーティー
Don`t Anger the God of Destruction! Excitement at the Birthday Party
Hakaishin o Okoraseruna! Dokidoki Tanjou Party
episode.summary: Beerus and Whis arrive on Earth, where Bulma`s birthday party is underway. Initially, Vegeta is paralyzed by Beerus` presence. He recalls a childhood encounter with the deity a long time ago when Beerus visited Planet Vegeta and threatened his father, King Vegeta. Shortly after, Bulma pops up. She invites Beerus and Whis to join the party. Beerus gladly accepts her offer and enjoys the food available. The two start mingling with the other guests, while Vegeta tries his best to ensure that Beerus remains calm. Whis soon learns of pudding, which he finds to be extraordinary delicious; so much so that he urges Beerus to have some too. It turns out that Majin Buu had taken the remaining pudding cups for himself and refuses to share. Angered by Majin Buu`s insolence, Beerus attacks him. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: 界王星の決戦! 悟空VS[たい]破壊神ビルス
The Ultimate Fight on King Kai`s Planet! Goku vs the God of Destruction Beerus
Kaiousei no Kessen! Gokuu tai Hakaishin Beerus
episode.summary: Beerus and Whis arrive on Kaiou-sama`s planet and detect Gokuu`s presence. While he is initially disappointed that Gokuu does not know what a "Super Saiyan God" is, he agrees to test his strength in a sparring match. Gokuu attempts to fight him in all of the Super Saiyan transformations but is outclassed every time. Beerus and Whis head for Earth shortly afterwards while Kaiou-sama uses his telepathy to warn Vegeta ahead of their arrival. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: 見せろ悟空! 超[スーパー]サイヤ人ゴッドの力[パワー]!!
Unleash It, Goku! The Power of the Super Saiyan God!!
Misero Gokuu! Super Saiyajin God no Power!!
episode.summary: Now a Super Saiyan God, Gokuu confronts Beerus. He is amazed by the immense power his body has gained with the transformation, so much so that he is initially unable to fully grasp its newfound potential. Fighting with Beerus, Gokuu manages to grow gradually into his new form. Seeing as how Gokuu might turn out to be a worthy adversary after all, Beerus decides it is time for them to unleash their true power and have a real battle of Gods. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: お待たせ, ビルス様 ついに超[スーパー]サイヤ人ゴッド誕生!
Sorry for the Wait, Beerus Sama. The Super Saiyan God Is Finally Born!
Omatase, Beerus-sama: Tsui ni Super Saiyajin God Tanjou!
episode.summary: Gokuu gathers the Dragon Balls together and summons Shenron who is startled by Beerus` presence. Shenron quickly explains that the Super Saiyan God is not a person but a legendary transformation that only kindhearted Saiyans can achieve by fusing their power together. The Saiyans attempt to transform Gokuu but fail, as they are one Saiyan short. Growing tired of waiting, Beerus starts preparing his attack to destroy the planet. Suddenly, Videl jumps in front of the Saiyans. She says that there is one more Saiyan who might be able to help them – her and Gohan`s unborn child. The Saiyans and Videl attempt the transformation again and manage to transform Gokuu into the Super Saiyan God. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: 悟空よ, 超[スーパー]サイヤ人ゴッドを超えてゆけ!
Goku, Surpass the Super Saiyan God!
Gokuu yo, Super Saiyajin God o Koeteyuke!
episode.summary: The Kaioushin are surprised that the Universe is still intact following the battle, but they fear the worst is still to come. On Earth, Vegeta, Whis, and the others are still standing by, watching the battle. Whis is surprised by the Super Saiyan God`s power and its ability to keep up with his trainee. In space, Gokuu struggles to keep up with Beerus` attack, which ultimately ends up in a massive explosion, blinding everyone on Earth. Shortly after, the light clears out, revealing everything to be as it was prior to the explosion. Beerus explains that he used his full power to negate the explosion, thereby saving the Universe. Seeing it as a perfect opportunity to boast, Mr. Satan arranges to have him be falsely credited with saving the planet yet again. Despite being at his limit, Gokuu remains calm, which annoys the God of Destruction. Beerus thinks Gokuu might have a strategy that he has been hiding which Gokuu promptly denies, saying that everything he had been doing was improvised as they fought. The Gods quickly power up and continue fighting, but this time, both at their limit. As soon as they start, Gokuu loses his Super Saiyan God aura and reverts to the ordinary Super Saiyan form. Upon noticing that, Beerus decides to quit, thinking it is pointless to fight an ordinary Saiyan. Gokuu, however, does not notice and keeps going at it. Able to sense Gokuu`s energy, Whis assumes that the battle has concluded and that Gokuu lost, but Piccolo begs to differ. Surprised that Gokuu is still able to hit him even after losing his God form, Beerus surmises that Gokuu`s body has adjusted to the Super Saiyan God power, making him stronger in his ordinary form. Gokuu proclaims that, with or without the Super Saiyan God form, it is still him that Beerus is up against, and the two resume their battle. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: 宇宙が砕ける!? 激突! 破壊神VS[たい]超[スーパー]サイヤ人ゴッド!
The Universe Crumbles?! Clash! God of Destruction vs. Super Saiyan God!
Uchuu ga Kudakeru!? Gekitotsu! Hakaishin tai Super Saiyajin God!
episode.summary: Gokuu and Beerus continue to fight in space. As both of them power up and clash, the universe begins to crumble under the power of the gods. Celestial bodies blow up due to the shockwaves. Meanwhile, Old Kaioushin reveals to the younger Kaioushin that with three more blows the whole universe would be destroyed along with Beerus and Gokuu. Gokuu, on landing the third clash with Beerus, unknowingly stops the universe`s collapse by balancing Beerus` attack with his own. Beerus gets enraged and uses his atomic bomb attack on Gokuu. Gokuu uses the Super Saiyan God energy to power up his Kamehameha attack to keep Beerus` attack at bay. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: 続けようぜビルス様! 神と神の戦いを!
Let`s Keep Going, Beerus Sama! Our Battle of Gods!
Tsuzukeyouze Beerus-sama! Kami to Kami no Tatakai o!
episode.summary: Having somewhat got a grip on the Super Saiyan God form, Gokuu initially manages to keep up with Beerus, but he soon realizes that his opponent is still not fighting at his maximum. It is revealed that Beerus is doing so only to motivate Gokuu to catch up with him. To that end, Beerus drags Gokuu to space where he swiftly knocks him out. Gokuu comes crashing down back to Earth and ends up in an ocean. Amazed by such power, Gokuu gets excited and powers up, healing himself in the process. Willing to have another go, he flies out of the ocean and dashes towards Beerus. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: 勇者サタンよ奇跡を起こせ! 宇宙からの挑戦状
Make a Miracle, Satan the Hero! A Challenge from Outer Space
¡Héroe Satán! ¡Haz el milagro! ¡Un desafío desde el espacio exterior!
Yuusha Satan yo Kiseki o Okose! Uchuu kara no Chousenjou
episode.summary: With Earth no longer in danger, Gokuu and the others return to their ordinary lives. Chichi orders Gokuu to leave training behind and find a job so he can support the family. Meanwhile, Mr. Satan`s self-promotion goes awry when a group of aliens land in the city. The aliens reveal that they are ambassadors who wish to thank and reward whoever defeated Beerus; thus protecting their planet from destruction. Before he is given the reward, however, Mr. Satan is asked to demonstrate his godlike power against the alien`s mightiest champion in a sparring match. Knowing that he does not stand a chance, Mr. Satan quickly scampers away to safety and calls for help, but no one answers him. Suddenly, Gokuu arrives at the scene in need of Mr. Satan`s help. Mr. Satan arranges to have Gokuu fight in his stead. Just before the fight, however, Gokuu spots Chichi and immediately runs away to avoid being scolded for disobeying her. Mr. Satan is left to confront the alien champion on his own. Suddenly, the aliens spot Mr. Satan`s dog and run away in fear. With the aliens gone, the crowd praises Mr. Satan, whom they think saved them and Earth yet again. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: これがオラのありったけの力だ! 決着! 神と神
This Is Every Ounce of Power I Have! The Battle of Gods` Conclusion!
Kore ga Ora no Arittake no Chikara Da! Kecchaku! Kami to Kami
episode.summary: Now with only a Super Saiyan form at his disposal, Gokuu powers up and attacks but to no avail as Beerus knocks him out effortlessly. With Gokuu knocked out, Beerus prepares to destroy Earth. In a final effort to stop Beerus, Gokuu once again powers up and charges his Kamehameha attack. Gokuu manages to prevent Beerus` attack, but he completely depletes what was left of his energy in the process. He comes crashing down to Earth onto Bulma`s ship, where Vegeta manages to catch him. Beerus lands on the planet shortly after to finish what he started, but he suddenly falls asleep. Whis explains that Gokuu must have tired Beerus out and that by the time he wakes up he will have forgotten about their trip to Earth. Beerus, who was faking his sudden sleep because humanity`s food convinced him to spare the planet, and Whis leave for Beerus` planet shortly after. With Earth safe again, Gokuu decides to relax and enjoy the party. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: 絶望ふたたび! 悪の帝王・フリーザの復活!
Despair Rises! The Emperor of Evil, Frieza, Resurrected!
Zetsubou Futatabi! Aku no Teiou - Freezer no Fukkatsu!
episode.summary: Goku and Vegeta continue their training under Whis on Beerus` planet. Meanwhile, Sorbet and his assistant Tagoma depart their ship and head for Earth in order to find the Dragon Balls, with which they intend to resurrect their leader Freeza. They run into the Pilaf Gang who had collected all seven Dragon Balls just before their arrival. Sorbet coerces Pilaf into summoning Shenlong. At first, Shenlong refuses to revive Freeza, seeing it as pointless given his current state – cut in pieces, just as he was when Future Trunks killed him. Tagoma suggests using their advanced healing technology to make Freeza intact again. Sorbet has Freeza resurrected, and they return to their ship. Freeza is completely renewed shortly afterwards. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: オラも来たぞ! ビルス星で修行開始だ!
I`m Here, Too! Training Begins on Beerus` Planet!
Ora mo Kita zo! Beerus-sei de Shuugyou Kaishi Da!
episode.summary: Goku and Whis arrive on Beerus` planet, where Vegeta is tasked with housekeeping. Goku is surprised to learn that Vegeta has gotten considerably stronger training under Whis and so wants to start his training right away. Before he is allowed to, however, Whis orders him to help Vegeta with the chores including changing Beerus` bed sheets without waking him up. Goku and Vegeta promptly do their chores and start their training with Whis. Whis` training routine quickly wears Goku out, and he falls asleep, while Vegeta, willing to surpass Goku at any cost, keeps on training. The next day, Whis decides to have a sparring match with his apprentices in order to gauge their speed. The two prove to be no match for Whis, being too slow to land a single hit. Meanwhile, somewhere in space, surviving members of Freeza`s army, led by Sorbet, continue with their effort of resurrecting their leader. Not far off, mysterious beings from a different Universe, known only as Shanpa and Vados, continue their search for Beerus. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: パン誕生! そして悟空は修行の旅へ!?
Pan Is Born! And Goku Goes on a Training Trip?!
¡El nacimiento de Pan! ¿¡Y el viaje de entrenamiento de Gokú!?
Pan Tanjou! Soshite Gokuu wa Shuugyou no Tabi e!?
episode.summary: Pan has been born. While most of her family members and friends think that she should be taught martial arts, Chi-Chi is revolted by the very idea. She believes that Pan should be raised to be a lady and not a mindless fighter like her grandfather Goku. Everyone tries to persuade Chi-Chi to change her mind but to no avail. Bulma accidentally mentions that Vegeta has been away training with Whis for six months, which shocks Goku. After some time, Whis returns to Earth to enjoy more of the food Earth has to offer. Goku approaches Whis and asks to become his pupil. Whis accepts, thinking it is the perfect time for Goku to join Vegeta in training. Just as the two are about to depart, Chi-Chi runs up and stops Goku from leaving. Despite her wishes, Goku ends up leaving with Whis. Chi-Chi then has a sudden change of heart, saying that Goku will return once he gets hungry anyway. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: ベジータが弟子入り!? ウイスを攻略せよ!
Vegeta Becomes an Apprentice?! Winning Whis Over!
¿¡Vegeta se convierte en un discípulo!? Conquista a Wiss
Vegeta ga Deshiiri!? Whis o Kouryaku Seyo!
episode.summary: Chi-Chi still has Goku doing work out on the farm. Instead of working, however, Goku decides to rest and falls asleep. Krillin flies in and wakes up Goku. Krillin is very surprised to hear that Goku is still on Earth and not training with King Kai. He reminisces about his training with Goku under Kame-Sennin and the power level difference between them since they were children. Curious to see how large the gap is, Krillin tells Goku to punch him with all his power. Reluctant Goku tries to change Krillin`s mind, but Krillin insists. Goku obeys and punches Krillin, sending him flying into a boulder. Shortly afterwards, Goku heads home, while Android 18 attends to Krillin`s wounds. Krillin states that he misses martial arts and wishes to start training again. Meanwhile, Vegeta is seen in the wastelands standing determined. He states his intent to surpass Goku without the aid of others. Elsewhere, Whis and Bulma are having lunch together. Whis is enjoying all the food Bulma is having her chef make. While they dine, Bulma asks Whis to protect Earth from Beerus in case he ever shows up again. Vegeta arrives and sees Whis. He asks Whis to see Beerus, but Whis refuses to do so. Whis tells Vegeta that he is Beerus` teacher and that, with the proper tutelage, he could one day surpass Goku. Vegeta bows and kneels before Whis and begs to become his student. An unimpressed Whis walks past him. Vegeta decides to convince Whis by giving him the tastiest food on Earth. After several failed attempts, Vegeta finally impresses Whis with a cup of instant noodle. Before Vegeta heads off with Whis to Beerus` planet, Bulma hands him new armor. They arrive on Beerus` planet shortly afterwards and prepare to train. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: チェーンジ! まさかの復活! その名はギニュー!!
Change! An Unexpected Return! His Name Is Ginyu!!
Change! Masaka no Fukkatsu! Sono Na wa Ginyu!
episode.summary: Tagoma proves to be a tough opponent and even Piccolo can’t take him. Gotenks joins the battle but suddenly Tagoma is taken over by…Ginyu?! Gohan is able to face him as a Super Saiyan but can he keep up when Frieza makes his move? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 復讐のはじまり! フリーザ軍の悪意が悟飯を撃つ!
The Start of Revenge! The Malice of Frieza Army Strikes Gohan!
Fukushuu no Hajimari! Freezer-gun no Akui ga Gohan o Utsu!
episode.summary: Without any way to get a hold of Goku or Vegeta, only Gohan and the remaining Z fighters are ready to face Frieza. Up against 1000 troops and the emperor of evil, our heroes may face more of a challenge than expected! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ジャコからの警告! 迫り来るフリーザと1000人の兵士達
Jaco`s Warning! Frieza and His 1000 Troops Approach
Jako kara no Keikoku! Semarikuru Freezer to 1000 Nin no Heishi-tachi
episode.summary: Once restored, Freeza plans revenge against Goku and Future Trunks. Tagoma objects to Freeza`s plans, but Freeza promptly subdues him. When Freeza finds out that Goku has gotten much stronger since they last met, he decides to train in order to become more powerful. He reveals that, since his power was inborn, he had never felt the need to train a day in his life before now. Four months pass before Freeza and his army head for Earth. All the while, Goku and Vegeta continue their training under Whis. Jaco the Galactic Patrolman travels to Earth to inform Bulma that Freeza had been revived and that he will be approaching Earth shortly with an army of one thousand soldiers. With Freeza`s army fast approaching, Bulma gathers the remaining Z fighters to face Freeza`s army in hopes of holding out until Goku and Vegeta make it back to Earth. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: 全開バトル! 復讐のゴールデンフリーザ
An All-Out Battle! The Revenge of Golden Frieza
Zenkai Battle! Fukushuu no Golden Freeza
episode.summary: Not to be outdone by Goku’s new form, Frieza reveals a new one of his own. Once again the two face off in an evenly matched battle. Meanwhile, Beerus and Whis make their way to Earth but run into allies of their own. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激突! フリーザVS[たい]孫悟空 これがオラの修行の成果だ!
Clash! Frieza vs Son Goku: This Is the Result of My Training!
Gekitotsu! Freeza tai Son Gokuu: Kore ga Ora no Shuugyou no Seika Da!
episode.summary: Goku and Frieza finally face off! With their powers matched, Frieza begins attacking Goku’s friends to catch him off guard. Frustrated, Vegeta pushes him to give it his all and face Frieza in his ultimate form! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 地球が! 悟飯が! 絶体絶命! 早く来てくれ孫悟空!!
The Earth! Gohan! Absolute Peril! Hurry and Get Here, Son Goku!!
Chikyuu ga! Gohan ga! Zettaizetsumei! Hayaku Kite Kure Son Gokuu!
episode.summary: Piccolo falls after attempting to save Gohan but there’s no time to deal with the loss. While Bulma finally gets a message to Whis for Goku and Vegeta, Gohan powers up to his highest level. And so does Freiza. Will Goku make it in time? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 第6宇宙の破壊神 その名はシャンパ
The God of Destruction from Universe 6: His Name Is Champa
Dai 6 Uchuu no Hakaijin: Sono Na wa Champa
episode.summary: Vegeta and Goku are continuing their training under Whis when they receive a pair of visitors—Beerus’ brother and Whis’ sister! After a comparison of culinary delights, Champa challenges Beerus to a universe-versus-universe tournament. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 地球爆発!? 決着のかめはめ波
The Earth Explodes?! The Deciding Kamehameha
Chikyuu Bakuhatsu!? Kecchaku no Kamehame Ha
episode.summary: With Goku badly injured, Vegeta steps in to face Frieza. Stronger than ever, Vegeta proves to be a challenge and an enraged Frieza destroys the planet! Protected by Whis, the Z fighters are given a chance to save Earth, if they act fast enough. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大ピンチに勝機が見えた! 反撃開始だ孫悟空!
A Glint of Hope Shines Through in a Crisis! Time to Fight Back, Son Goku!
Dai Pinch ni Shouki ga Mieta! Hangeki Kaishi Da Son Gokuu
episode.summary: Goku is having trouble facing Golden Frieza until he realizes the other is quickly losing stamina. Gaining the upper hand, Goku gives Frieza a chance to leave Earth for good. But the emperor of evil isn’t ready to give up his revenge just yet. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 驚け第6宇宙よ! これが超[スーパー]サイヤ人・孫悟空だ!
Behold, Universe 6! This Is the Super Saiyan? Son Goku!
Odoroke Dai 6 Uchuu yo! Kore ga Super Saiyajin Son Gokuu Da!
episode.summary: The fight between Gokuu and Botamo commences. Gokuu takes a while to warm up due to having overeaten during the trip. Although Gokuu seems faster and more well trained than Botamo, none of the hits that he lands seem to have an effect. Botamo seems content to simply take the punishment. Urged by Vegeta to think before he acts, Gokuu drags Botamo to the side of the ring and then throws him out. This results in a win for Universe Seven. The next match begins almost immediately. The Freezer look alike named Frost is Goku`s next opponent. In direct contrast to Freezer, Frost is a kind and beloved hero in Universe Six who looks forward to a challenge. Gokuu surprises Frost with knowledge of his transformations. Frost assumes a form that mirrors Freezer`s third form. Gokuu mentions his ability to transform as well. He transforms into a Super Saiyan. Frost responds by transforming into his final form. Frost seems greatly outmatched by Gokuu even in his final transformation. Suddenly, a strange effect comes over Gokuu that severely weakens him and allows Frost a chance to strike. Frost knocks Gokuu out of the ring, which stuns everyone from Universe Seven. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: 試合開始だ! みんなで「名前のない星」へ!
The Match Begins! Let`s All Go to the "Nameless Planet!"
Shiai Kaishi Da! Minna de "Namae no Nai Hoshi" e!
episode.summary: On Earth everyone gathers for the trip to the tournament, with Goku and Vegeta arriving after having trained in the Room of Spirit and Time. After stopping at Beerus` planet to get both him and Monaka, everyone proceeds to the tournament. The group meets their competition who are all somewhat strange, and include a Saiyan with a radically different history, as well as a fighter who looks like Freeza. After the written test the Universe Seven team is left one man down as Majin Buu falls asleep and is disqualified. Beerus decides that Monaka will go last, and after a round of rock-paper-scissors it is Goku that will fight first, followed by Vegeta and Piccolo. Goku and his competitor Botamo, who is a giant bear-like creature, enter the ring and square off for the first match. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: ズノー様のもとへ! 超ドラゴンボールのありかを聞き出せ!
Off to Zuno Sama`s! Find Out Where Super Dragon Balls Are!
Zunoo-sama no Moto e! Super Dragon Ball no Arika o Kikidase!
episode.summary: To find out more about the Super Dragon Balls, Jaco takes Bulma to the all-knowing alien, Master Zuno. But their trip is disturbed when they encounter the criminal, Geppuman. They’re given three questions to ask Zuno—will they get the answers they need? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 『格闘試合』へのおさらい 残り二人のメンバーは誰だ!?
A Review Before the `Martial Arts Match`: Who Are the Last Two Members?!
"Kakutou Shiai" e no Osarai: Nokori Futari no Member wa Dare Da!?
episode.summary: Goku and Vegeta recruit Piccolo and Majin Buu as the remaining combatants of the Universe Seven team. Gohan considered joining the team, but he was unable to do so as he had a business meeting on the day of the tournament. Beerus and the others think back over recent events. A series of flashbacks recapping the series is shown. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: 格闘試合開催決定! 主将は悟空よりも強いヤツ
The Martial Arts Match Has Been Decided! The Team Captain Is Stronger Than Goku
Kakutou Shiai Kaisai Kettei! Shushou wa Gokuu yori mo Tsuyoi Yatsu
episode.summary: Bulma suggests summoning Shenron to find the remaining Super Dragon Balls, but even his power is not enough. As they prepare for the upcoming match, Beerus reveals there’s a fighter stronger than Goku who’s going to join the team of the 7th Universe! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: まさかの大苦戦! ベジータ怒りの大爆発!
An Unexpected Desperate Battle! Vegeta`s Furious Explosion!
Masaka no Daikusen! Vegeta Ikari no Daibakuhatsu!
episode.summary: The battle literally heats up as Magetta starts a heatwave. Cornered, Vegeta destroys the barrier around him and unleashes his power against his opponent. Will he bring this battle to a cool conclusion or melt under pressure? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 怒りを力に変えろ! ベジータの全開バトル
Turn Rage Into Strength! Vegeta`s Full-On Battle
Ikari o Chikara ni Kaero! Vegeta no Zenkai Battle
episode.summary: Vegeta prepares to face Frost, who has no intention of discontinuing his cheating. But with a single hit, Vegeta knocks Frost completely out of the ring for the win. Before the next round, Goku is added back to the lineup, and Champa adds a new rule. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ピッコロVS[たい]フロスト 魔貫光殺砲にすべてをかけろ!
Piccolo vs. Frost: Put It All on the Special Beam Cannon!
Piccolo tai Frost: Makankousappou ni Subete o Kakero!
episode.summary: After Goku’s sudden defeat, Piccolo steps into the ring! Frost continues to be a challenge, and right when Piccolo is beaten, Jaco makes a discovery—Frost hasn’t been fighting fair! But Vegeta’s not ready to let him off with a disqualification. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Ending 3
Ending 2
Opening 1e
Opening 1d
Opening 1c
Opening 1b
ついに決着! 勝者はビルス? それともシャンパ?
At Last, It Comes to an End! Is the Winner Beerus? Or Is It Champa?
Tsui ni Kecchaku! Shousha wa Beerus? Soretomo Champa?
episode.summary: Goku and Hit continue to fight evenly matched as they reach unbelievable heights with their abilities. But as Goku continues to strain his body—he does the unthinkable! Will the 6th Universe be named the winners?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 成長した"時とばし"の反撃!? 出るか!? 悟空の新たな技!
The Advanced "Time-Skip" Fights Back?! Will It Come Forth? Goku`s New Technique!
Seichou Shita "Toki Tobashi" no Hangeki!? Deruka!? Gokuu no Arata na Waza!
episode.summary: Figuring out Hit’s “time-skipping” ability allows Goku to keep up—until Hit powers up! Will Goku finally face defeat, or does the Saiyan have a secret power of his own? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 第6宇宙最強の戦士! 殺し屋ヒット見参!!
The Ultimate Warrior of Universe 6! Assassin Hit Appears!!
Dai 6 Uchuu Saikyou no Senshi! Koroshiya Hit Kenzan!!
episode.summary: Vegeta goes up against the last member of the 6th Universe, the assassin Hit! With movements so fast nobody can even see him, Hit proves to be a true match for Vegeta. Will the prince of Saiyans finally fall? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サイヤ人の誇りを忘れるな! ベジータVS[たい]第6宇宙のサイヤ人
Don`t Forget Your Saiyan Pride! Vegeta vs the Saiyan of Universe 6
Saiyajin no Hokori o Wasurena! Vegeta tai Dai 6 Uchuu no Saiyajin
episode.summary: It’s Saiyan versus Saiyan in this next epic battle! The two seem evenly matched until Vegeta demands Cabbe transform into a Super Saiyan, only to learn the boy is incapable. Will Vegeta show mercy, or has he strayed to his old, evil ways?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ポトフ星の封印 解き放たれた"超人水"の秘密!
Planet Potaufeu`s Seal. The Secret of the "Superhuman Water" Unleashed!
Potofu Sei no Fuuin: Tokihanatareta "Choujinsui" no Himitsu!
episode.summary: After getting stuck in Monaka’s truck, Goten and Trunks wind up on Planet Pot-au-feu. Here, they protect an old man and get caught in a fight over…water?! But the truth about this water could leave them high and dry! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悟空の「気」が制御不能!? パンのお世話で四苦八苦
Goku`s "Energy" Is Out of Control?! Caring For Pan Is a Handful
Gokuu no "Ki" ga Seigyo Funou!? Pan no Osewa de Shikuhakku
episode.summary: Goku starts having trouble controlling his body and energy! After visiting with King Kai, he learns he’s on strict bed rest until his energy levels out. But when he goes to stay at Gohan’s, he finds taking it easy with baby Pan around isn’t so easy. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 波乱の祝勝会! 遂に対決!? モナカVS[たい]孫悟空
The Victory Celebration of Chaos! They Battle at Last?! Monaka vs Son Goku
Haran no Shukushoukai! Tsui ni Taiketsu!? Monaka tai Son Gokuu
episode.summary: Bulma plans a victory party for all the fighters and wants to include Monaka. Beerus fears Goku will learn the truth of his newest rival and tries to keep him from going. But when Monaka shows up, they’ll have to figure out a way to keep it all secret! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 出でよ神の龍 そして願いを叶えてちょんまげ!
Come, Dragon of the Gods: And Grant Me My Wish, Pretty Peas!
Ide yo Kami no Ryuu: Soshite Negai o Kanaete Chonmage!
episode.summary: Before the winner can gloat, a newcomer appears in the ring! Beerus and Champa are struck with fear—just who is this Zeno? And finally, it’s time to make a wish on the Super Dragon Balls, that is, if they can find the last one. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: HOPE[きぼう]!! 再び 現在[いま]で目覚めよトランクス
Hope!! Once More Awaken in the Present, Trunks
Kibou!! Futatabi: Ima de Mezameyo Trunks
episode.summary: With barely enough time to stop the dark entity that’s after him, Trunks travels back to the past. But when he arrives, can present Trunks handle seeing his future self?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 未来からのSOS! 黒き新たな敵現る!!
An SOS from the Future! A Dark New Enemy Emerges!!
Mirai kara no SOS! Kuroki Arata na Teki Arawaru!!
episode.summary: Life in the present may be peaceful but trouble is stirring in the future! Trunks is risking everything to get back to the past to find help. But will he escape the new evil that threatens the future in time to get help from our heroes? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悟空VS[たい]複製ベジータ! 勝つのはどっちだ!?
Goku vs. the Cloned Vegeta! Which One Will Win?!
Gokuu tai Fukusei Vegeta! Katsu no wa Docchi Da!?
episode.summary: As Vegeta begins to disappear, Goku faces the duplicate Vegeta! But can he defeat the copy and save the original before he vanishes? And when the fight starts, is Vegeta rooting for…his clone?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ベジータが消える!? 複製ベジータの脅威!
Vegeta`s Disappearing?! The Threat of the Cloned Vegeta!
Vegeta ga Kieru!? Fukusei Vegeta no Kyoui!
episode.summary: After being drained of his energy, Vegeta and the others escape and learn more about the Superhuman Water. And if they don’t stop the clones, Vegeta could disappear—for good! With time running out, will Gotenks be enough to stop them? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悟空VS[たい]ブラック! 閉ざされた未来への道
Goku vs Black! The Closed Path to the Future
Gokuu tai Black! Tozasareta Mirai e no Michi
episode.summary: Black suddenly appears from a mysterious portal. Goku sees this as an opportunity to test his look-alike’s power firsthand. But while the battle rages on, Black glances at the time machine with a sinister look in his eye. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 未来からのメッセージ ゴクウブラック襲来!
A Message from the Future: Goku Black Strikes!
Mirai kara no Message: Gokuu Black Shuurai!
episode.summary: After regaining consciousness, Future Trunks describes how he came to arrive in the present. But apparently not even the gods are allowed to meddle with the past. Bulma and Future Trunks might have a bit of explaining to do. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 師弟再会 孫悟飯と"未来"トランクス
Teacher and Student Reunited: Son Gohan and "Future" Trunks
Shitei Saikai: Son Gohan to "Mirai" Trunks
episode.summary: Repairs on the time machine continue, so Future Trunks goes to visit an old friend. However, times have changed, and the reunion isn’t quite what he expected. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 時をこえた想い トランクスとマイ
Feelings That Travel Beyond Time: Trunks and Mai
Toki o Koeta Omoi: Trunks to Mai
episode.summary: Bulma gets to work repairing the old time machine that she’s kept. Meanwhile, Future Trunks recalls his experiences with Mai. But two questions remain: why does Black have a time ring? And what’s the extent of his power? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Ending 4
再戦ゴクウブラック! 超[スーパー]サイヤ人ロゼ登場
Rematch with Goku Black! Super Saiyan Rose Appears
Saisen Gokuu Black! Super Saiyajin Rose Toujou
episode.summary: Future Trunks, Vegeta, and Goku finally use the time machine with intention to confront Black. But when they arrive, they’re greeted by a familiar face and an unfamiliar power. Will they be able to stand up to this new threat? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 孫悟空に会いたいのね 全王様からのよびだし!
I Want to See Son Goku: Zen-Oh Sama`s Summoning!
Son Gokuu ni Aitai no ne: Zen`ou-sama kara no Yobidashi!
episode.summary: Zeno demands to meet with Goku and asks him for something very odd. Meanwhile in the 10th Universe, Zamasu’s hatred for humans grows. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サイヤ人の血をひく者 トランクスの決意
The One Who Inherits the Saiyan Blood: Trunk`s Resolve
Saiyajin no Chi o Hiku Mono: Trunks no Ketsui
episode.summary: The time machine repairs are finishing up. Vegeta and Future Trunks go training, but the extent of Vegeta’s power is unlike anything Future Trunks has ever seen. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ブラックの正体を暴け! いざ第10宇宙の界王神界へ!
Uncover Black`s Identity! To the Sacred World of the Kais!
Black no Shoutai o Abake! Iza Dai 10 Uchuu no Kaiou Shinkai e!
episode.summary: The nature of Black’s power remains a mystery, so Whis, Beerus, and Goku go to the 10th Universe to find answers. Will challenging an apprentice Supreme Kai really help with the investigation? Goku seems to think so. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 再び未来へ 明かされるゴクウブラックの正体!!
Back to the Future: Goku Black`s Identity Is Revealed!!
Futatabi Mirai e: Akasareru Gokuu Black no Shoutai!!
