episode.summary: Beerus is convinced that his actions should’ve influenced the future, but Future Trunks isn’t so sure! Now it’s time for Goku, Vegeta, and Future Trunks to see for themselves—and Bulma is going, too! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 界王神ゴワスを守れ ザマスを破壊せよ!
Protect Supreme Kai Gowasu: Destroy Zamasu!
Kaioushin Gowasu o Mamore: Zamasu o Hakai Seyo!
episode.summary: Supreme Kai Gowasu is in grave danger! Now that gods are involved, Zamasu’s treachery isn’t a mortal matter anymore. Beerus will have to take matters into his own hands. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ザマスとブラック 深まる二人の謎
Zamasu and Black: The Mystery of the Two Deepens
Zamasu to Black: Fukumaru Futari no Nazo
episode.summary: Zamasu’s mind is wandering down a dark path. Goku and Whis think they’ve solved the riddle regarding his and Black’s strength. His malice may be unnoticed now, but Zamasu’s ill will is beginning to dismantle his innocent facade! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 不死身の体を持つ神 ザマス降臨
The God with the Immortal Body: Zamasu Descends
Fujimi no Karada o Motsu Kami: Zamasu Kourin
episode.summary: With Vegeta out of the fight, Goku and Future Trunks must fight Future Zamasu and Black with a man down. But can they hope to defeat an opponent who brushes off even the strongest attacks? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 崇めよ! 讃えよ! 合体ザマス爆誕!!
Revere Him! Praise Him! Fusion Zamasu`s Explosive Birth!!
Agame yo! Tatae yo! Gattai Zamasu Bakutan!!
episode.summary: Vegeta’s rage inspires Black to draw upon his own anger and unleash a devastating new ability. Mortal arrogance is proving to be a large enough thorn in Future Zamasu’s side that a permanent decision must be made! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サイヤ人の細胞を汚すな! ベジータの壮絶バトル開演!!
Don`t Disrespect Saiyan Cells! Vegeta`s Heroic Battle Begins!!
Saiyajin no Saibou o Kegasuna! Vegeta no Souzetsu Battle Kaien!!
episode.summary: Future Trunks challenges Black and Future Zamasu on his own. Goku, Vegeta, and Bulma hurry back to save him, but upon arrival, the time machine is damaged! This time the Saiyan prince is itching to dish out some payback! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 世界はオレが守る! トランクス怒りの超[スーパー]パワー炸裂!!
I`ll Protect the World! Trunks` Furious Super Power Explodes!!
Sekai wa Ore ga Mamoru! Trunks Ikari no Super Power Sakuretsu!
episode.summary: Fighting rages on, and things are looking grim for our heroes. They might not be able to win, but Future Trunks can at least defend the others while they escape! Time is running out, but a new strategy may be the key to victory. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ザマスの野望 語られる恐怖の「人間0計画」
Zamasu`s Ambition: The Awful "Zero Mortal Plan" Is Revealed
Zamasu no Yabou: Katarareru Kyoufu no "Ningen 0 Keikaku"
episode.summary: The future is unchanged, Black isn’t what Goku had initially thought, and the situation has escalated to something more severe. With this new information, will the Saiyan trio fare better than before? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: いでよ神龍[シェンロン]! 叶える願いは誰のもの!?
Come Forth, Shenron! Whose Wish Will Be Granted?!
Ide yo Shenron! Kanaeru Negai wa Dare no Mono!?
episode.summary: Bulma tries to secretly build a time machine despite Beerus’ disapproval. Meanwhile, Goku gathers the Dragon Balls to revive King Kai. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新たなHOPE[きぼう]!!を胸に さらばトランクス
With New Hope!! in Our Hearts: Farewell, Trunks
Arata na Kibou!! o Mune ni: Saraba Trunks
episode.summary: Merged Zamasu’s ashes rises a universe encompassing darkness. Out of energy and out of options, Goku needs some help, and fast! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決戦! あきらめない戦士たちの奇跡の力[パワー]
The Climactic Battle! The Miraculous Power of a Relentless Warrior!
Kessen! Akiramenai Senshi-tachi no Kiseki no Power
episode.summary: Merged Zamasu’s immortality is limited! Vegeta and Goku ask the Supreme Kais for help. Will their combined strength prevail over such a significant threat? Is this the chance for Future Trunks to get his revenge? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最後の審判か!? 絶対神の究極の力[パワー]
Is This the Final Judgement?! The Ultimate Power of the Absolute God
Saigo no Shinpan ka!? Zettaishin no Kyuukyoku no Power
episode.summary: Zamasu and Black merge into an immortal being with limitless power. Is this the end of Future Trunks’ world? Is there any hope left for a victory? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 反撃なるか!? 見えない殺しの技!!
Will There Be a Counterattack?! The Invisible Killing Strike!!
Hangeki Naruka!? Mienai Koroshi no Waza!!
episode.summary: After cleverly saving himself from an instant death, Goku is itching to find out the nature of Hit’s abilities. Will Goku’s deductions prevent his untimely destruction? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悟空死す! 絶対執行の暗殺依頼
The Death of Goku! The Guaranteed Assassination Mission
Gokuu Shisu! Zettai Shikkou no Ansatsu Irai
episode.summary: Goku is convinced someone is trying to kill him, and he’s ready to fight for his life. However, can Goku withstand an assassination attempt from the brutally efficient Hit? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: シャンパからの挑戦状! 今度は野球で勝負だ!!
Champa`s Challenge! This Time We Fight with Baseball!
Champa kara no Chousenjou! Kondo wa Yakyuu de Shoubu Da!!
episode.summary: Champa really wants delicious Earth food, and what better way to convince Beerus to let him visit than with a friendly game of baseball? But when the thrill of competition heats up, “friendly” could turn to deadly! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悟空VS[たい]アラレ! ハチャメチャバトルで地球が終わる!?
Goku vs Arale! A Ridiculous Battle Will End the Earth?!
Gokuu tai Arale! Hachamecha Battle de Chikyuu ga Owaru!?
episode.summary: During an invention award show that Bulma is attending, a robot girl named Arale crashes the party. Tricked by the spectral Dr. Mashirito, she has an incredible urge to play and won’t let Saiyans get in her way! How can Goku and Vegeta defeat an opponent who blissfully ignores the laws of physics?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悟飯の災難! グレートサイヤマンまさかの映画化!?
Gohan`s Misfortune! An Unexpected Great Saiyaman Movie?!
Gohan no Sainan! Great Saiyaman Masaka no Eigaka!?
episode.summary: Gohan accepts an opportunity to be a stunt double in the Great Saiyaman movie. But keeping his identity as the real Great Saiyaman a secret will be difficult when there’s a parasitic alien floating around town! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: やろうぜ全王様! 宇宙一武道会!!
Let`s Do It, Zen-Oh Sama! The All-Universe Martial Arts Tournament!!
Vamos Nessa, Senhor Zen`Ou! O Torneio de Artes Marciais entre Todos os Universos!!
Yarouze Zen`ou-sama! Uchuuichi Budoukai!!
episode.summary: The Tournament of Power has been on the back burner for a while. Bored of day-to-day work and tired of waiting, Goku convinces Zeno to get the ball rolling! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 強敵を打ち破れ! クリリンの闘志ふたたび!
Defeat These Terrifying Enemies! Krillin`s Fighting Spirit Returns!
Derrote esses Inimigos Terríveis! O espírito de luta de Kuririn retorna!
Kyouteki o Uchiyabure! Krillin no Toushi Futatabi!
episode.summary: Upon entering a strange cave, Krillin and Goku are confronted by enemies from their past. Can Krillin find the courage to defeat them, or is history destined to repeat itself? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悟空とクリリン 懐かしの修行の場へ
Goku and Krillin: Back to the Old Training Grounds
Goku e Kuririn: De volta para o antigo campo de treinamento
Gokuu to Krillin: Natsukashi no Shugyou no Ba e
episode.summary: Everyone is too busy to spar with Goku, so he seeks out Krillin for old times’ sake. Disappointed in his current combat ability, Krillin decides that he’s in dire need of retraining. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 愛するもののために! 不屈のグレートサイヤマン!!
For the Ones He Loves! The Unbeatable Great Saiyaman!!
Pelos que Ele Ama! O Imbatível Grande Saiyaman!!
Ai Suru Mono no Tame ni! Fukutsu no Great Saiyaman!!
episode.summary: Barry, the self-absorbed actor, tries to undermine Gohan’s reputation! But when the parasite chooses Barry as its host, it’s not just Gohan who’s in trouble. With the main actor under alien control, can Gohan save both the city and the movie? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 眠った闘志を呼び覚ませ! 孫悟飯の闘い!!
Awaken Your Sleeping Battle Spirit! Son Gohan`s Fight!!
Nemutta Toushi o Yobisamase! Son Gohan no Tatakai!!
episode.summary: Gohan is up next. Out of practice and lacking knowledge of his opponent’s tactics, he’ll have to learn as he goes. But soon after the round begins, Gohan is forced to fight blind in more ways than one. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 第9宇宙蹴りのバジルVS第7宇宙魔人ブウ!!
Universe 9`s Basil the Kicker vs Universe 7`s Majin Buu!
Dai 9 Uchuu Keri no Basil vs Dai 7 Uchuu Majin Buu!!
episode.summary: First round of the exhibition match is Basil versus Buu! With no energy signatures to hint at their power levels, the 9th Universe’s warriors could be much more powerful than they seem. But that won’t distract Buu from his playtime. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 全宇宙の神様もドン引き!? 負けたら消滅「力の大会」
The Gods of Every Universe in Shock?! Losers Erased in the Tournament of Power
Os deuses de todos os universos em choque ?! Perdedores apagados no Torneio do Poder
Zen Uchuu no Kamisama mo Donbiki!? Maketara Shoumetsu "Chikara no Taikai"
episode.summary: It’s official, the Tournament of Power is announced. There’s just one problem: the losers of the tournament will have their universes erased! To introduce his future self to the joys of martial arts, Zeno calls for an exhibition match between the 7th and 9th Universe. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: スカウトマン孫悟空 クリリンと18号を誘う
Son Goku the Recruiter Invites Krillin and No. 18
Scout Man Son Gokuu: Krillin to 18 Gou o Sasou
episode.summary: Krillin must prove himself to both Gohan and Goku if he wants to enter the Tournament of Power. With martial arts tournament rules in play, Krillin’s strength isn’t solely based on his power level! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 第7宇宙代表チームを結成せよ! 最強の10人は誰だ!?
Form the Universe 7 Representing Team! Who Are the Strongest Ten?!
Dai 7 Uchuu Daihyou Team o Kessei Seyo! Saikyou no 10 Nin wa Dare Da!?
episode.summary: Time to choose a roster for the Tournament of Power, but finding ten of the strongest fighters in the universe is no easy task! Meanwhile, Vegeta and Bulma’s child is close to being born. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 孫悟空許すまじ! 正義の戦士トッポ乱入!!
Never Forgive Son Goku! Toppo the Warrior of Justice Intrudes!!
Son Goku Yurusumaji! Seigi no Senshi Toppo Rannyuu!!
episode.summary: Insulted by Goku’s nonchalance regarding the Tournament of Power, a warrior from the 11th Universe challenges Goku to a battle for justice! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 潰しのベルガモVS孫悟空! 青天井の強さはどっちだ!?
Bergamo the Crusher vs Son Goku! Which One Wields the Limitless Power?!
Tsubushi no Bergamo vs Son Gokuu! Aotenjou no Tsuyosa wa Docchi Da!?
episode.summary: The 9th Universe’s third combatant tries to talk Zeno out of erasing losing universes. Zeno agrees on one condition: the 9th Universe must win the exhibition match. However, if Goku throws the fight, all universes will suffer the consequences! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Ending 5
Ending 6
悟飯とピッコロ 師弟激突の限界修業!
Gohan and Piccolo: Teacher and Pupil Clash in Max Training!
Gohan to Piccolo: Shitei Gekitotsu no Genkai Shugyou!
episode.summary: Piccolo tries to retrain Gohan. But Gohan will have to draw from past experiences if he wants to reach his full potential. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 密猟団を狩れ! 悟空と17号の共闘!!
Hunt the Poachers! Goku and No. 17`s United Front!!
Mitsuryoudan o Kare! Gokuu to 17 Gou no Kyoutou!!
episode.summary: When intergalactic poachers threaten Android 17’s island, it’s up to Goku to help him save the animals. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 初めて交わる拳! 人造人間17号VS孫悟空!!
Fists Cross for the First Time! Android #17 vs Son Goku!!
Hajimete Majiwaru Kobushi! Jinzouningen 17 Gou vs Son Gokuu!!
episode.summary: Android 17 has been busy. Not only has he started a family, but he’s been training as well. Will Goku see him as a worthwhile member of the team? And is he even interested in joining? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 動き出す宇宙 それぞれの思惑
The Universes Begin to Make Their Moves: Their Individual Motives
Ugokidasu Uchuu: Sorezore no Omowaku
episode.summary: Goku tries to find Android 17. In the meantime, the tournament stress is affecting the gods of each universe, causing them to bicker among themselves. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 緊急実態発生! そろわない10人のメンバー!!
Emergency Development! The Incomplete Ten Members!!
Kinkyuu Jittai Hassei! Sorowanai 10 Nin no Member!!
episode.summary: Buu is stuck in a hibernation-like sleep! Meanwhile in the 6th Universe, Cabba teaches Caulifla how to become a Super Saiyan. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 勝ち残るのはどの宇宙だ!? 続々と集う最強の戦士たち!!
Which Universe Will Survive?! The Strongest Warriors Are Gathering!!
Kachinokoru no wa Dono Uchuu Da!? Zokuzoku to Tsudou Saikyou no Senshi-tachi!!
episode.summary: The Zenos can hardly contain their excitement for the tournament to come. The participating universes are recruiting at different rates, so hopefully they can gather enough warriors before the deadline! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 越えるべき壁を見据えて! 悟空VS悟飯
See the Wall That Must Be Passed! Goku vs Gohan
Koerubeki Kabe o Misuete! Gokuu vs Gohan
episode.summary: There’s time for a sparring match before the tournament. It’s an all-out fight between two Saiyans! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 現れた謎の美女! 天津流道場の怪!?
An Unknown Beauty Appears! The Tenshin-Style Dojo`s Mystery?!
Arawareta Nazo no Bijo! Tenshin Ryuu Doujo no Kai!?
episode.summary: Goku finds the last two members for the Tournament of Power. But someone from Tien’s past interferes with the recruitment process. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Opening 1f
時はきた! 宇宙の命運をかけ無の世界へ!!
The Time Is Here! To the World of Void for the Fate of the Universe!!
Toki wa Kita! Uchuu no Meiun o Kake Mu no Sekai e!!
episode.summary: The stage is set and the teams are ready. The universes finally gather in the World of the Void for the Tournament of Power! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最凶! 最悪! フレーザ大暴れ!!
The Worst! The Most Evil! Frieza`s Rampage!!
Saikyou! Saiaku! Freezer Ooabare!!
episode.summary: Ambushed and outnumbered, Frieza shows his strength. Can he be trusted, or will his psychopathic tendencies get the best of him? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悪の帝王復活! 出迎える謎の刺客たち!?
The Emperor of Evil Returns! A Reception of Mysterious Assassins?!
Aku no Teiou Fukkatsu! Demukaeru Nazo no Shikaku-tachi!?
episode.summary: Goku meets with Fortuneteller Baba to resurrect Frieza. Will attempts on Frieza’s new life delay their return to the group?! With disqualification on the table, time is running out! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 10人目の戦士はおめえだ! 悟空フリーザのもとへ!!
You`re the Tenth Warrior! Goku Goes to See Frieza!!
10 Ninme no Senshi wa Omee Da! Gokuu Freezer no Moto e!!
episode.summary: The 7th Universe is desperate for a tenth member, so Goku seeks out Frieza as a potential candidate. In the 6th Universe, Cabba and Caulifla try to goad Kale into training with them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大暴走! 目覚め荒ぶる狂戦士!!
Out of Control! The Savage Berserker Awakens!!
Dai Bousou! Mezame Araburu Kyousenshi!!
episode.summary: Following Universe 7’s first loss, the fighting stage is starting to clear out. As ranks are thinned, Goku finds Caulifla and her protégée. But Goku and Caulifla’s dueling triggers a frenzied rage that will permanently alter the arena. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 見せつけろ! クリリンの底力!!
Show Them! Krillin`s True Power!!
Misetsukero! Kuririn no Sokojikara!!
episode.summary: The erasure of Universe 9 serves as a grim reminder that existence itself is at risk. When the dust settles, Krillin and No. 18 break out their spousal synergy against a combatant from Universe 4. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: あぁ無常! 絶望する宇宙!!
Oh, Uncertainty! A Universe Despairs!!
Aa Mujou! Zetsubou Suru Uchuu!!
episode.summary: Goku finds himself facing most of Universe 9’s warriors by himself. But when Vegeta interjects, suddenly the playing field seems a lot more level! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 生き残れ! ついに開幕「力の大会」!!
Survive! The Tournament of Power Begins at Last!!
Ikinokore! Tsui ni Kaimaku "Chikara no Taikai"!!
episode.summary: Let the battle begin! With so many competitors on one stage, teamwork is in short supply. Going off alone could mean the elimination of some powerful warriors! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 超絶光速バトル勃発! 悟空とヒットの共同戦線!!
The Ultimate High Speed Battle Begins! Goku and Hit Join Forces!!
Chouzetsu Kousoku Battle Boppatsu! Gokuu to Hit no Kyoudou Sensen!!
episode.summary: Universe 6’s Hit and Universe 11’s Dyspo clash at breakneck speed. Even Hit’s signature Time Skip is too slow to be effective against Dyspo! But when a second Pride Trooper intervenes on his teammate’s behalf, Goku arrives to tip the scales. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悟飯よ非情なれ! 第10宇宙との決戦!!
Gohan, Show No Mercy! Showdown with Universe 10!!
Gohan yo Hijou Nare! Dai 10 Uchuu to no Kessen!!
episode.summary: Angered by the loss of their teammate but in no position to fight, the remaining warriors from Universe 2 retreat and regroup. Gohan and Piccolo face off against the last two fighters from Universe 10. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 愛の力が大爆発!? 第2宇宙の魔女っ子戦士!!
The Power of Love Explodes?! Universe 2`s Little Witch Warriors!!
Ai no Chikara ga Daibakuhatsu!? Dai 2 Uchuu Majokko Senshi!!
episode.summary: Brianne and her companions from Universe 2 reveal their more powerful forms. It’s time to see what they’re made of! Has No. 17 bitten off more than he can chew? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 迫りくる正義の戦士! プライド・トルーパーズ!!
The Impending Warriors of Justice! The Pride Troopers!!
Semarikuru Seigi no Senshi! Pride Troopers!!
episode.summary: Three Saiyans are cut off from their teams, so the Pride Troopers attack! As the Tournament of Power progresses, teamwork is proving to be a threateningly powerful tactic. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: フリーザとフロスト! 交わる悪意!?
Frieza and Frost! Conjoined Malice?!
Freezer to Frost! Majiwaru Akui!?
episode.summary: While Goku is busy fighting Ribrianne, Gohan faces a fighter from the 2nd Universe, and Frieza’s loyalty to the 7th Universe comes into question. What could Frieza possibly be planning? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 復讐の「F」! しかけられた狡猾な罠!?
Revenge "F"! The Cunning Trap?!
Fukushuu no "F"! Shikakerareta Koukatsu na Wana!?
episode.summary: There are 36 warriors left, and quality is beginning to overtake quantity. Since most of the 7th Universe’s fighters remain, the 4th Universe’s Frost is ready to pick a fight with them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 見極めろ! 姿なきアタッカーとの死闘!!
Find Him! Death Match with an Invisible Attacker!!
Mikiwamero! Sugatanaki Attacker to no Shitou!!
episode.summary: The 4th Universe has it out for Master Roshi! Against multiple opponents, how will technique fare against power? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 奮戦! 武天老師命を燃やす!!
A Desperate Battle! Master Roshi`s Sacrifice!!
Funsen! Muten Roushi Inochi o Moyasu!!
episode.summary: The 4th Universe has it out for Master Roshi! Against multiple opponents, how will technique fare against power? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 孫悟空覚醒! 目覚めし者の新たなる極意!!
Son Goku Wakes! New Level of the Awakened!!
Son Gokuu Kakusei! Mezameshi Mono no Aratanaru Gokui!!
episode.summary: An awesome flash of light marks the end of Goku and Jiren’s clash. When the dust settles, what kind of power will rise from the ashes? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悟空に迫る最強の敵! 今こそ放て! 必殺の元気玉!!
The Ultimate Enemy Approaches Goku! Now, Let Loose! The Killer Spirit Bomb!!
Gokuu ni Semaru Saikyou no Teki! Imakoso Hanate! Hissatsu no Genkidama!!
episode.summary: Jiren finally confronts Goku and so begins a spectacle that will affect everyone on the battlefield! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 鬼気せまる! 新たな超戦士の爆誕!!
Intimidating Passion! The Birth of a New Super Warrior!!
Kiki Semaru! Aratana Chou Senshi no Bakutan!!
episode.summary: Kale goes berserk in her and Caulifla’s fight with Goku. Power levels continue to grow in a duel that will push both parties to the limit! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 嬉々として! 戦闘狂サイヤ人バトル再び!!
With Great Joy! The Repeat Battle-Crazy Saiyan Fight!!
Kiki Toshite! Sentoukyou Saiyajin Battle Futatabi!!
episode.summary: Goku is still recovering from his previous fight, but Caulifla has ambitions that only Goku can help her achieve. The two fighters quickly gain power in this Saiyan vs. Saiyan blitz! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サイヤ人の誓い! ベジータの覚悟!!
A Saiyan`s Vow! Vegeta`s Resolution!!
Saiyajin no Chikai! Vegeta no Kakugo!!
episode.summary: After their tough loss, it’s up to the three Saiyans of the 6th Universe to press onward. But with only half the time left and opportunistic fights cropping up across the arena, Cabba is on his last leg. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 異次元の極致バトル! ヒットVSジレン!!
The Surreal Supreme Battle! Hit vs Jiren!!
Ijigen no Kyokuchi Battle! Hit vs Jiren!!
episode.summary: With Goku out of the fight, Hit takes this opportunity to rid the field of its biggest threat. Maybe the key to Jiren’s downfall is time itself! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 逆転の兆し! 身勝手の極意が大爆発!!
The Sign of a Comeback! Ultra Instinct`s Huge Explosion!!
Gyakuten no Kizashi! Migatte no Gokui ga Daibakuhatsu!!
episode.summary: Goku and Kefla’s battle comes to a head! With Goku’s Ultra Instinct kicking in, Kefla must risk it all if she has any hope of defeating her opponent! Who will come out on top?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悟空VSケフラ! 超[スーパー]サイヤ人ブルー敗れる!?
Goku vs Kefla! Super Saiyan Blue Defeated?!
Gokuu vs Kefla! Super Saiyajin Blue Yabureru!?
episode.summary: Goku and Kefla take center stage as fighting continues among the other universes. How will Goku’s stamina hold up against the multiplied strength of two fused Saiyans?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 完璧なる生存戦略! 第3宇宙脅威の刺客!!
The Perfect Survival Tactic! Universe 3`s Menacing Assassin!!
Kanpeki Naru Seizon Senryoku! Dai 3 Uchuu Kyoui no Shikaku!!
episode.summary: There are three universes left! The 3rd Universe’s strategy has worked well thus far, but how will it fare against Gohan, Goku, and Vegeta?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 回避不能!? ステルス攻撃の猛威!!
Unavoidable?! The Fierce Stealth Attack!!
Kaihi Funou!? Stealth Kougeki no Moui!!
episode.summary: As more and more universes drop out of existence, most of the remaining combatants are either strong or deceptive. The warriors from the 7th Universe are taken by surprise by hidden threats that are finally making themselves known! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 加速する悲劇 消えゆく宇宙...
Accelerated Tragedy: Vanishing Universes...
Kasoku Suru Higeki: Kieyuku Uchuu...
episode.summary: On the verge of annihilation and with only a few warriors left, the 2nd and 6th Universes are reinvigorated. Desire to win will push their fighters to new heights! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 愛の大決戦! 人造人間VS第2宇宙!!
Showdown of Love! Androids vs Universe 2!!
Ai no Daikessen! Jinzouningen vs Dai 2 Uchuu!!
episode.summary: With most of Goku’s stamina spent, fighters from the other universes rush to knock him out of the tournament. The 2nd Universe’s warriors of love are out for blood, and it’s up to the androids of the 7th Universe to stop them! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 己の誇りをかけて! ベジータ最強への挑戦!!
For One`s Own Pride! Vegeta`s Challenge to Be the Strongest!!
Onore no Hokori o Kakete! Vegeta Saikyou e no Chousen!!
episode.summary: Only two universes remain! The strongest of the 7th Universe are pitted against the strongest of the 11th Universe. As the tournament nears its end, it’s time for the combatants to push themselves above and beyond! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 総力戦! 究極の4体合体VS第7宇宙総攻撃!!
All-Out War! The Ultimate Quadruple Merge vs Universe 7`s Full-Scale Attack!!
Souryokusen! Kyuukyoku no 4 Tai Gattai vs Dai 7 Uchuu Soukougeki!!
episode.summary: The 3rd Universe activates its secret final weapon! The 7th Universe will need to combine all their strength if they hope to defeat this quadruple-fused foe! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 疾風怒涛の猛襲! 悟飯背水の陣!!
The Fiercely Overwhelming Assault! Gohan`s Last Stand!!
Shippuu Dotou no Moushuu! Gohan Haisui no Jin!!
episode.summary: Frieza and Dyspo’s duel is accelerating out of control! As Frieza gets pushed back, Gohan enters the mix in hopes of getting a quick elimination. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 全身全霊全力解放! 悟空とベジータ!!
Body and Soul, Full Power Release! Goku and Vegeta!!
Zenshinzenrei Zenryoku Kaihou! Gokuu to Vegeta!!
episode.summary: Jiren shrugs off even the strongest individual attacks! However, can the combined strength of Goku and Vegeta stand up against his immense power? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 威風堂々! 破壊神トッポ降臨!!
With Imposing Presence! God of Destruction Toppo Descends!!
Ifuudoudou! Hakaishin Toppo Kourin!!
episode.summary: Because of the 7th Universe’s numbers advantage, Android 17 hopes to run out the clock. When Frieza comes over to provide support, Top is forced to rethink his motivations and will unleash a familiar destructive power! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 神をも超えろ! ベジータ捨て身の一撃!!
Surpass Even a God! Vegeta`s Desperate Blow!!
Kami o mo Koero! Vegeta Sutemi no Ichigeki!!
episode.summary: Both sides are becoming more and more desperate. Top has given up everything to survive! Vegeta gives up nothing! In the end, who will be looking down on whom?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 気高い誇り最後まで! ベジータ散る!!
Noble Pride to the End! Vegeta Falls!!
Kedakai Hokori Saigo made! Vegeta Chiru!!
episode.summary: Following Android 17’s sacrifice, the remaining Saiyans need time to recover. As Goku rests, Vegeta takes it upon himself to challenge Jiren one on one! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 迫りくる障壁! 希望を託した最後のバリア!!
The Approaching Wall! The Final Barrier of Hope!!
Semarikuru Shouheki! Kibou o Takushita Saigo no Barrier!!
episode.summary: Jiren is all that remains between the 7th Universe and victory. But with Frieza out for the count and Vegeta low on stamina, how will they compare to one who values strength above all else? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 奇跡の決着! さらば悟空! また会う日まで!!
The Miraculous Conclusion! Farewell, Goku! Until We Meet Again!!
Kiseki no Kecchaku! Saraba Gokuu! Mata Au Hi made!!
episode.summary: Goku and Jiren are at the end of their ropes as the clock winds down! Will the 7th Universe finally emerge victorious?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 空前絶後の超決戦! 究極のサバイバルバトル!!
The Greatest Showdown of All Time! The Ultimate Survival Battle!!
Kuuzenzetsugo no Chou Kessen! Kyuukyoku no Survival Battle!!
episode.summary: Goku fights for everyone dear to him. Jiren fights only for himself. Overwhelmed and on the verge of defeat, Jiren’s resolve is reignited. He’ll stop at nothing to prevent his past from repeating! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 限界超絶突破! 身勝手の極意極まる!!
Limits Super Surpassed! Ultra Instinct Mastered!!
Genkai Chouzetsu Toppa! Migatte no Gokui Kiwamaru!!
